lines:
March 22, 1910,

on 22, 2010,

1936

do oknollenge B Territo: regs ar op die 24th inste 
enclosing check for $600.00 which I neve reposited to your son's account. You 
need ofter no apologies for your delay. I have been put to no inconvenience

whatever

I am particularly interested to learn that you may visit Andover in the 
mer future. De small be delighted to welcome you to Andover. As you doubtlens 
know, we enjoyed a visit from lár, Pong kaisen last Prise En stata several days in

Ancover, and every one thoroughly enjoyed him.

W kind personal regarde believe me

Very sincerely yours,
raw: March 22, 1910,  on 22, 2010,  1936  do oknollenge B Territo: regs ar op die 24th inste  enclosing check for $600.00 which I neve reposited to your son's account. You  need ofter no apologies for your delay. I have been put to no inconvenience  whatever  I am particularly interested to learn that you may visit Andover in the  mer future. De small be delighted to welcome you to Andover. As you doubtlens  know, we enjoyed a visit from lár, Pong kaisen last Prise En stata several days in  Ancover, and every one thoroughly enjoyed him.  W kind personal regarde believe me  Very sincerely yours,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledged receipt of the $600 check to be applied to his son's account. Stearns is delighted that Dr. Kwan will be visiting Andover and recalls that he enjoyed the visit of Mr. Tong Kaison last fall.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
